title: Init
content:
So, I recreated my website with Next.js and Tailwind CSS this time!
I had some problems with adding projects. So, i will leave my thoughts here!

title: Fixing my discord bot
content: I am very happy that Tapris works again. I had TypeScript errors for over a month, and i fixed them by searching on official discord.js server. I found only one working solution, that's week old. I hope other people in chat with same problem will find that solution :D
